RenameShellAsync(ShellRenameRequest, CancellationToken)

Renames a shell asynchronously by sending a rename request to the API.

Declaration
public Task<SuccessResponse> RenameShellAsync(ShellRenameRequest request, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ShellRenameRequest request

The shell rename request containing necessary information.
CancellationToken cancellationToken

A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<SuccessResponse>

A SuccessResponse indicating the result of the rename operation.
Exceptions
Type Condition
ApiException

Thrown when the API returns an error response.
Exception

Throws when HTTP request fails, JSON deserialization fails, or an unexpected error occurs.
